pkgmetadata.longdescription: # xocto - utilities for Python servicesProven utilities used on Python services at Kraken Technologies. This libraryworks with Python 3.9 and above.CI status:[![CircleCI](https://circleci.com/gh/octoenergy/xocto/tree/main.svg?style=svg)](https://circleci.com/gh/octoenergy/xocto/tree/main)- PyPI detail page: <https://pypi.python.org/pypi/xocto>- Documentation: <https://xocto.readthedocs.io/>
